name: Torogo
tagline: Torogo is a free Android app to play regular and toroidal go over the internet
body:
![Torogo](http://i.imgur.com/sH6TNMo.png)  

### A new way to Go
Toroidal go is an elegant variant of the game of go. It requires no special corner and border tactics (Joseki). The board scrolls and wraps around to reveal only middle space.

How to play:
```
Install the Sneer chat app.
Send an invite to a friend.
While chatting to your friend, tap on the "apps" button.
Search for Apps > Torogo.
Play!
```

### Authors and Contributors
Torogo is a free, peer-to-peer Go application by
Klaus Wuestefeld, Lucas Santos, René Cusumano, Laércio Junior and Matías Rodriguez.

### Support
If you have any issue, feel free to open a ticket on https://github.com/beothorn/Torogo/issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
